Package it.polimi.ingsw.gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AskPrometheusPowerWindow
    JDialog that asks if the player wants to use prometheus' power
    AskToUseTheGodsPower
    JDialog that asks if the player wantw to use his god's power
    ButtonHandler
    Class that handles all the mouse click and interprets them by putting the correct image on the right spot
    CellButton
    Gui button of the cell, which the user interacts with by clicking, to select the move, build, ecc..
    ChooseGodCardToPlayWindow
    Displays all the existing god available for a game, and by passing the mouse over each one of them, it will be displayed its power, in order to choose your favorite!
    ChooseGodCardWindow  
    ConfirmButton
    Default button used to confirm choices
    GameFrame
    Main Frame of the game for the Gui, where the player can see all the god cards in game and the relative powers, the tokens on the field, read messages and play santorini!
    GameLostPanel
    Panel which displays that the player lost
    GameOverDialog
    Dialog window showing winning or losing messages
    GameWonPanel
    Panel which displays that the player lost
    GodButton
    Button to select your GodCard
    GodPanel
    Panel which displays the Gods
    GodSelectedWindow
    It displays a nice graphic of the selected gods for the game
    InnerMainPanel
    Creates al the necessary graphic tools for the main Gameframe, and passes them to the actual GameFrame, which display them in a nice way for the user.
    LogoPanel
    Initial frame in which the user has to click PLAY to start the game
    NickNamePanel
    It loads the panel on wich the user has to select his nickname for the game
    NickNameWindow
    Frame for recognising the user from its name, which will be his username for the game
    NumberOfPlayersPanel
    Little frame to let the first user select the number of players he wants to play with [2/3]
    NumberOfPlayersWindow
    Little frame to let the first user select the number of players he wants to play with [2/3]
    PowerPanel
    Panel that ask the user if he wants to use hig god Power
    PrometheusPanel
    Panel that ask the user if he wants to use hig Prometheus Power, because prometheus changes radically the turn
    SwingView
    Class that implements the user view of the game, if he selects to use the Graphic User Interface
    WelcomeFrame
    The first frame that invites the user to play, he has just to click on PLAY
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Pics
    Enum with all the useful images for tui GUI
